author: lgo
msg: When using a proxy with serf, we have to specify the root url of our repository
when creating request buckets. Serf needs this to convert our relative uri in
(load_config): Register that whether we're using a proxy in the session.
(svn_ra_serf__setup_serf_req): Set the repository root url on the request
(become_request): Set the repository root url on the request bucket, if using
